name: Osborne Clarke
goal: Osborne Clarke is an international legal practice with offices in Europe, Asia and in the US. OC focuses on sectors and issues at the cutting edge of the law, such as building smart cities, the sharing economy and blockchain, and has a high profile in the media and technology sector.
interests: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Osborne Clarke advises clients on EU business law and policy. OC follows the implementation of the Digital Single Market Strategy, as well as the legislative developments linked to e-commerce from a commercial, privacy and competition point of view. Also, OC follows the European funding activities, especially those linked to Horizon 2020 and the new European Fund for Strategic Investments. In this regard, OC assisted various R&D&I consortia. OC also represents clients from the automotive, banking and technology sectors in dealings with the EU institutions.
